title: Trump says he will meet Putin again after 'great progress' during call
description: The call comes a day before Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky visits the White House.
content:
US President Donald Trump says "great progress" was made during a phone call with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday, with the pair agreeing to face-to-face talks in Hungary.
He said the call, the first with Putin since mid-August, was "ver... [3695 chars]

title: Brace for early flu season in England and get vaccinated, say experts
description: Rise in flu levels being driven by cases among children and young people, say public health leaders
content:
The flu season could be coming early this year, public health experts in England have said, adding that those who are eligible for a free vaccination should take up their offer.
According to the UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA), an increase in flu l... [2470 chars]

title: Jordan Pickford signs new Everton deal: 'Dark days behind us'
description: England goalkeeper Jordan Pickford signs a new contract at Everton that will keep him at the club until the summer of 2029.
content:
England goalkeeper Jordan Pickford has signed a new contract at Everton that will keep him at the club until the summer of 2029.
The 31-year-old joined the Toffees from Sunderland in 2017 for £30m, a British record fee for a goalkeeper at the time.

title: United States Grand Prix 2025 declared 'heat hazard' race
description: The United States Grand Prix in Austin is the second race in succession to be declared a "heat hazard" under F1's rules.
content:
The United States Grand Prix is the second race in succession to be declared a "heat hazard" under Formula 1's rules.
Temperatures at the Circuit of the Americas in Austin, Texas, are forecast to be more than 31C during both the sprint race on Saturd... [472 chars]

title: Netanyahu 'determined' to pressure Hamas to find remaining dead hostages
description: The Israeli prime minister's comments come after Hamas said it could not access the bodies of 19 hostages in Gaza.
content: Israel's prime minister has told a memorial for victims of the Hamas-led attack on 7 October 2023 that he is "determined" to secure the return of the dead hostages still inside Gaza, and that the country will continue to fight terrorism with "full fo... [4506 chars]
